mapper.insert: INSERT INTO products ( product_code, title, description, price, email, category_id, transaction_type, registration_type, latitude, longitude, meeting_place, address, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{productCode}, #{title}, #{description}, #{price}, #{email}, #{categoryId}, #{transactionType}, #{registrationType}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{meetingPlace}, #{address}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.product_code, p.title, p.description, p.price, p.email, p.category_id, p.transaction_type, p.registration_type, p.latitude, p.longitude, p.meeting_place, p.address, p.created_at, p.updated_at, -- 대표 이미지 (thumbnailPath) 설정 (NULL 방지) COALESCE( (SELECT image_path FROM productimages pi WHERE product_id = p.id AND is_thumbnail = TRUE LIMIT 1), (SELECT image_path FROM productimages pi WHERE product_id = p.id LIMIT 1), '/uploads/default_thumbnail.jpg' ) AS thumbnail_path, pi.image_path FROM products p LEFT JOIN productimages pi ON p.id = pi.product_id WHERE p.id = #{id}
